Articles.Content:
Hello there...

This community is great, but you don't usually really have anyone in your neighborhood to talk about KSP with... So...

Is there anyone, who'd also like to talk on skype/Teamspeak while playing KSP or just talk to some other guy who plays this game as well?

Anyone is welcome... and just to introduce myself a little bit... I'm 22 years old, I play KSP since 0.15 (=> for a year and something) and live in Czech Republic

The only requirement is that you should just be able to speak English

Looking forward to hear from someone (you can send a private message, should you prefer that)

Edited August 23, 2013 by Fyzzi
I have a skype but i'm on the West Coast of USA so probably bad timezone for you...
Depends... what time is it at your location now?

I guess they should have 13 PM now... that wouldn't mind that much

however, should anyone want to talk a bit, my skype is fyzzicek

I'm not interested in a "chat mate" while playing.

But I would be interested in an interesting save file exchange. See:

Some sort of competitive space race play

I'm not interested in a "chat mate" while playing.

But I would be interested in an interesting save file exchange. See:

Some sort of competitive space race play

Not exactly what I'm looking for, sorry

You should get the KLF (Kerbal Live Feed) mod and join us. It's basically adds chat, screenshot sharing, and craft file sharing.

I love it.

You should get the KLF (Kerbal Live Feed) mod and join us. It's basically adds chat, screenshot sharing, and craft file sharing.

I love it.

Thanks, I know that mod, but there are several facts why I'm not using it... it drops performance quite significantly (some lag spikes depending on the number of connected players)
I'm from Hungary, the time zone is the same Skype name: rappit12341 (Can't remeber how many accounts i had )

Skype name: ledj31 (yeah, there was a time, I tried to mix... I still try, though ^^)

From France! GMT+1 w/ DST. Welcome to everyone, french and english people out there. Ready to blow up things in a few days with you, guys!
Looking pretty well so far just a bit more people and we can arrange ourselves some TeamSpeak room to talk in... the first "KSP guild" ever!!!
I'd also suggest using the official IRC channel, plenty of KSP fans there obviously.

Of course, I have only the klf mod, and that gets boring after a slight while.

Teamspeak, I have never done before, and I would be glad to join if it existed.
Ordinarily, I'd be on TS but I have had some buggy things with my mic lately. When I get them ironed out, then I will be back on.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/21641-Community-Voice-Server-In-space-WE-can-hear-you-scream%21?highlight=teamspeak

Here's a teamspeak channel, it sometimes has people on it.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/21641-Community-Voice-Server-In-space-WE-can-hear-you-scream%21?highlight=teamspeak

Here's a teamspeak channel, it sometimes has people on it.

Hmmm nice to know it's already been settled... thanks for the tip... Oh and it's almost a year old topic, huh? I have to be reeeeally bad at searching on the forum for specific topics
